Package game

Class SniperRifle

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
      • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
        • game.RangedWeapon
          • game.SniperRifle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, Weapon, ItemInterface
    public class SniperRifle
extends RangedWeapon
    A sniple rifle which is a type of ranged weapon that rewards patience.
    Author:
    Lua Shi Liang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SniperRifle​(Item ammunition)
      Create a SnipleRifle object using a String that specifies its name, a char that specifies its display character, an integer that specifies the amount of damage this sniple rifle does and an item which represents the ammunition to be loaded into this sniple rifle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Inform this carried sniple rifle of the passage of time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SniperRifle

        public SniperRifle​(Item ammunition)
        Create a SnipleRifle object using a String that specifies its name, a char that specifies its display character, an integer that specifies the amount of damage this sniple rifle does and an item which represents the ammunition to be loaded into this sniple rifle.
        Parameters:
        ammunition - item representing the ammunition to be loaded into this sniper rifle

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick​(Location currentLocation,
                 Actor actor)
        Inform this carried sniple rifle of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if this sniple rifle is being carried. This method calls RangedWeapon.loadAmmunition(Actor, ItemCapability) method from the parent class to indicate that it is loaded with ammunition.
        Overrides:
        tick in class Item
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this sniple rifle.
        actor - The actor carrying this sniple rifle.
